fields.label: Cortex Page Builder
fields.name: cortex_page_builder_sidebar
fields.instructions: Drag as many page components as you need that can include blog posts, events, slide shows, WordPress TinyMCE Editors, WooCommerce Products, & more. After adding your body components, select a sidebar, and that will display to the left or right of the body components you add here.

sub_fields.label: Custom Class
sub_fields.name: custom_class
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a custom class name for further customization with CSS

sub_fields.label: Slides
sub_fields.name: slides
sub_fields.instructions: Generate a simple slider using the flex slider with images and content

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Attach your image to the slide. Make sure all slide images are the same width/height!

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: Enter in the content for the slide if any

sub_fields.label: Link
sub_fields.name: link
sub_fields.instructions: Link this slide to a post or page?

sub_fields.label: External Link
sub_fields.name: external_link
sub_fields.instructions: If you'd prefer to link this slide to an external link outside of your site.

sub_fields.label: Custom Class
sub_fields.name: custom_class
sub_fields.instructions: Enter in a custom class for this section

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Attach the full width image. Recommend using an image that's at least 2000 pixels wide

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: Enter any content you'd like to display over the image

sub_fields.label: Display Overlay
sub_fields.name: display_overlay
sub_fields.instructions: Put a semi-transparent full width/height overlay over the image to make the content over the image easier to read?

sub_fields.label: Custom Class
sub_fields.name: custom_class
sub_fields.instructions: Enter in a custom class for this section

sub_fields.label: Heading
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Optional field for a title which will show up as a main heading above your posts

sub_fields.label: Sub Heading
sub_fields.name: sub_title
sub_fields.instructions: Optional field for a subtitle which will show up below the main title

sub_fields.label: Posts Layout
sub_fields.name: c9_posts_layout
sub_fields.instructions: Select the layout you'd like to use for the blog posts. Default is split with the featured image/video/audio on the left, and the title/meta/excerpt on the right. Full Width layout is similar to Tumblr with the full width image on top and the title/meta/excerpt below. Sticky posts will always be full width.

sub_fields.label: Filter By Category
sub_fields.name: filter_by_category
sub_fields.instructions: Filter posts by category or leave blank to show all post categories

sub_fields.label: Filter By Format
sub_fields.name: filter_by_format
sub_fields.instructions: Filter posts by format type or leave blank to show all post formats

sub_fields.label: Display view more button?
sub_fields.name: view_more_btn
sub_fields.instructions: Display a "view more" button

sub_fields.label: View More Button Link
sub_fields.name: view_more_button_link
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the link to your posts page

sub_fields.name: title

sub_fields.placeholder: Enter the title to be displayed above the events listing

sub_fields.placeholder: Enter the sub title to be displayed below the main title

sub_fields.label: Event Display Type
sub_fields.name: event_display_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select the style of display you would like to use for this events listing

choices.big: Featured Images & Listing
choices.basic: Basic Listing

sub_fields.label: Limit by category?
sub_fields.name: limit_by_category
sub_fields.instructions: If you'd like to limit the event to one specific category please select it here. The default is to show all events.

sub_fields.label: Number of events to display
sub_fields.name: number_of_events_to_display
sub_fields.instructions: How many events would you like to display?

sub_fields.label: Display view more button?
sub_fields.name: view_more_btn
sub_fields.instructions: Display a "view more" button

sub_fields.label: View More Button Link
sub_fields.name: view_more_button_link
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the link to your full events listing page

sub_fields.label: Custom Code
sub_fields.name: custom_code
sub_fields.instructions: Copy and paste any HTML, CSS, or Javascript code into the field. Make sure to use opening and closing tags for styles, javascript, and HTML or else it may break the design.

sub_fields.label: Custom Class
sub_fields.name: custom_class
sub_fields.instructions: Enter in a custom class (if necessary) for the custom code field

sub_fields.label: Content Above Product Grid
sub_fields.name: content_above_product_grid
sub_fields.instructions: Enter in any content to display above the product grid. (Title, subtitle, etc.)

sub_fields.label: Product Filter Options
sub_fields.name: product_sorting_options
sub_fields.instructions: If you'd like to limit the product grid to a specific product type, tag, or category select it here.

sub_fields.label: Product Category
sub_fields.name: product_category
sub_fields.instructions: Limit the product grid to a category?

sub_fields.label: Product Tag
sub_fields.name: product_tag
sub_fields.instructions: Limit the product grid to a product tag?

sub_fields.label: Order By
sub_fields.name: order_by
sub_fields.instructions: What order do you want to display the products by?

sub_fields.label: Number of Products
sub_fields.name: number_of_products
sub_fields.instructions: Select the number of products you'd like to display in the product grid.

sub_fields.name: view_more_btn
sub_fields.instructions: Display a "view more" button

sub_fields.name: view_more_button_link
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the link to your full products listing page
